summary: TRAILING ARM TO REAR AXLE BROKEN INTO TWO PIECES FOR THE SECOND TIME. MOBILITY WORKS REPLACED THE ARM AT 34000 MILES WITH AN IMPROVED VERSION WHICH IS NOW BROKEN AT 58000 MILES. THEY ARE REFUSING TO REPLACE THE ARM AGAIN STATING OUT OF WARRANTY. THEY ADMIT THAT THEY HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THEM BREAKING AND SAY THEY HAVE A RECALL BUT WILL NOT REPLACE BECAUSE VEHICLE IS OUT OF WARRANTY.
